question: The variations of resistivity <katex>$\rho$</katex> with absolute temperature T for three different materials X, Y and Z are shown in the graph below. Identify the materials X, Y and Z.
images/2025-phy-25-1.png
choices: X - copper, Y - semiconductor, Z - nichrome
X - semiconductor, Y - nichrome, Z - copper
X - nichrome, Y - copper, Z - semiconductor
X - copper, Y - nichrome, Z - semiconductor
explanation: X: Resistivity increases linearly/curved with T (Metal/Copper).
Y: Resistivity is high and changes slowly with T (Alloy/Nichrome).
